system.name: Herald of Pride
system.effect: When wielding Melee Weapons, you may use Command or Intimidate instead of Combat to determine the Damage Base of your Struggle Attacks, to resist Disarm Maneuvers, and to qualify for a Weaponâ€™s Moves. Your Weapon Attacks ignore Damage Reduction up to your Command or Intimidate Rank.
system.prerequisites: Elemental Connection (Dragon), Novice Command, Novice Intimidate
